params.agentPubKeyHash: Keccak256 hash of agent's Ed25519 public key
params.chainRoot: Current root hash of the memory chain (latest entry hash)
params.entryCount: Number of entries in the chain
params.signature: Agent's Ed25519 signature over (chainRoot, entryCount, chainId)

params._anchorFee: Initial fee in WITNESS tokens (with decimals)
params._burnFees: Whether to burn WITNESS fees (true) or send to treasury (false)
params._dustFee: ETH dust fee per anchor (e.g., 0.0001 ether)
params._treasury: Address to receive ETH dust fees (and WITNESS if not burning)
params._witnessToken: Address of the WITNESS ERC20 token

returns._0: The anchor at the specified index

params.limit: Maximum number of anchors to return

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

anchor(bytes32,bytes32,uint64,bytes).notice: Anchor an agent's memory chain state on-chain

anchorCount(bytes32).notice: Mapping from agent public key hash to total anchor count

anchorFee().notice: Fee in WITNESS tokens required per anchor

anchors(bytes32,uint256).notice: Mapping from agent public key hash to array of anchors

burnFees().notice: Whether WITNESS fees are burned (sent to 0xdead) or sent to treasury

constructor.notice: Initialize the registry with token and fee configuration

dustFee().notice: ETH dust fee per anchor (sent to treasury)

getAnchor(bytes32,uint256).notice: Get a specific anchor by index

getAnchorHistory(bytes32,uint256,uint256.notice: Get paginated anchor history for an agent

getLatestAnchor(bytes32).notice: Get the most recent anchor for an agent

witnessToken().notice: The WITNESS token used for fees
